mapper.select: SELECT sc.student_course_seq AS studentCourseSeq , s.hrd_net_id AS hrdNetId , c.course_number AS courseNumber , s.name AS name , sum(pc.point) AS totalPoint FROM courses c, students s, students_points sp, point_categories pc, students_courses sc WHERE (sc.student_id=s.student_id AND sc.course_seq=c.course_seq AND sc.student_course_seq=sp.student_course_seq AND sp.point_seq=pc.point_seq) AND s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND c.course_number = #{courseNumber} GROUP BY sc.student_course_seq LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT point_seq, category, POINT FROM point_categories WHERE is_active = 'T' ORDER BY point_seq;
